about_the_game:
is a magical adventure fighting game set in the distant and mysterious Dancing Blade Continent. Due to the invasion of foreign evil forces, the entire continent is shattered. In order to protect the remaining Pure Land - Guangxi City State, you will transform into a talented hero warrior and venture deep into the Abyss Realm, clearing through obstacles and unlocking massive equipment skills, challenging Abyss Cross Server Bosses, and featuring a plethora of unique gameplay such as multiplayer dungeons, guild battles, treasure hunting in secret realms, career awakening, and pet cultivation. Dear warrior, your adventure journey is about to begin. Come and experience it!

Game features:

Fierce Battle Abyss, Cool Strike

Endless exploration of Diablo City, restoring classic Abyss game level ultra clear graphics, refreshing fighting combo, stunning damage kill, and full screen release of cool special effects skills.

【 Featured dungeon, smooth competition 】

Multiple dungeons for you to challenge, reward for hunting gold to critically attack bosses, team up to brush monsters with buff bonuses, and dominate the entire server in PVP fair competition.

Charm Fashion, Personalized Matching

Awaken and switch professions, unlock rich set resources, create versatile and exclusive appearance images according to your heart, combine skills to launch gorgeous attacks, and double the combat power with one click upgrade.

Massive benefits, surprise broadcast

Fancy gift packages, special promotion activities, equipment treasure chests, limited time luxury gifts, festive celebrations, and massive welfare rewards are waiting for you to take!

Ultra high explosion rate, free hanging up

High degree of freedom gameplay experience, transparent explosive loading rate on the ground, automatic AFK instant combat, easy to operate and upgrade on AFK!
